Exaggerate: The claim in the post exaggerates the information by stating that President Trump has tested positive for COVID-19, when in fact the original Fox News report only stated that one of his valets tested positive.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a short video clip without any additional evidence or context.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, as the video has been edited to remove certain words and alter the chyron, which changes the original meaning of the report.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump tested negative for COVID-19, as reported by multiple news sources.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting misleading information and selectively editing the video to fit a false narrative.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the edited video accurately represents the original Fox News report, which is not the case.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
